name: PREG_PLAN_BLOOD_PROD
description: Blood products that are acceptable to a patient for use during an emergency in labor and delivery (L&D).

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PREG_PLAN_BLOOD_PROD_C_NAME
columns.description: This item is intended to indicate the types of blood transfusion products that are acceptable to the patient in the case of an emergency, particularly during labor and delivery.
